body_html:
Unfortunately, no support for batching padded sparse tensors. Currently getting this error:

TypeError: Batching of padded sparse tensors is not currently supported

Any thoughts on when this will get implemented? I'm currently using 1.5.0-rc1

Cheers,
Tom

body:
Unfortunately, no support for batching padded sparse tensors. Currently getting this  error:
```
TypeError: Batching of padded sparse tensors is not currently supported
```

Any thoughts on when this will get implemented? I'm currently using `1.5.0-rc1`

Cheers,
Tom
